name: CreateReleaseBoardItem
description: Creates an item on a release board with various relationships like build pipeline, pull request, and user stories.
author: Erwin van den Bogaard

inputs.name: teamProject
inputs.label: Team project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the team project

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: The title of the work item that will be created

inputs.name: workItemType
inputs.label: Work item type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of the work item that will be created (User Story, Bug, Issue, Task, Epic, etc.)

inputs.name: areaPath
inputs.label: Area path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The area path of the new work item

inputs.name: iterationPath
inputs.label: Iteration path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The iteration path of the new work item

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: The description of the work item

inputs.name: additionalTags
inputs.label: Additional tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional tags you want to add to the work item

inputs.name: customFieldMappings
inputs.label: Add data to other fields not automatically filled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide each field on a new line with field=value syntax
